name: Thistle

guide.title: Summary
guide.text:
Thistle is Yao/Burn team's support.

You don't need to pull on banners for Thistle as you can get her for free as a reward from Eternal Nightmare: Heart of Eternity. Thistle does not need any further Shackles. 1119 is enough for Thistle to function well as Yao's support, but if you are playing Yanyan too, you'll want to invest in Thistle's Ult to increase [Burn] damage.

info: A Sinner adept at breaking Cores. Deals Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.
maniaIntensifyText: Core Damage dealt by Ultimate is increased by 1 point.
criminalRecord:
Trained by the Garden, she was tasked with assassinating the president of the Future Charity Foundation during an operation targeting Paradeisos officials. After being captured and incarcerated by the Eastside Public Security Bureau, she collaborated and executed escape attempts with other Sinners, causing social unrest with a detrimental impact. Immediate detention and interrogation is recommended.

--

Interrogation and testimonies from other Sinners reveal that after losing both parents, the subject joined the Garden seeking a chance for vengeance. She was briefly trained and participated in only a few missions. Most of her aggressive actions are a response to her protective urge. Since her detention, she's been comforted by the stable living environment, companions, and Chief's promise. Her mind has gradually stabilized, and she has rediscovered her passion for life.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject can form a flame blade in her palm or line the weapon she's holding with fire and extend the blade. The flames possess all the characteristics of ordinary fire and can continue burning with blood as fuel upon contact with wounds.

+++* Awakening Signs
While searching for her mother, she accidentally uncovered a conspiracy by the mastermind. She followed the suspect to the Rust and witnessed another victim become part of the broken wall. As the subject was infected by the Rust's highly concentrated Mania and under extreme anger, panic, and grief, her special power awakened.

+++* Corruption State
With a lighter degree of corruption, her body shows no physical signs of mutation. Though mostly sane, she's impulsive and exceedingly stubborn in nature. It's believed that she is still under the influence of Mania.

arrestRec1: She was suspected to be hiding in Syndicate with the remnants of the Garden and her Mentor, but the Bureau did not detect her presence during the arrest of the Garden's remnants. A few days after the detention, she planned and executed an assassination attempt on Chief alone, which failed and resulted in her capture by the Bureau.
arrestRec2: The subject's father was a member of the FAC, and her mother worked at a publishing house before marriage. After her father died on a mission in N.F. 103, her mother gave up all her benefits and moved to the outskirts of Eastside to raise the subject alone. Despite their impoverished life, the subject continued to receive a normal education and engage in social activities.
arrestRec3: After failing to file for her mother's disappearance in N.F. 111, the subject attempted to investigate on her own and accidentally discovered that her mother was killed for persistently seeking the truth about her father's death. Her power awakened by the shock, she vowed to seek vengeance and disappeared at the end of N.F. 111. The subject admits to have joined the Garden to prepare herself for her revenge.
arrestRec4: After completing her revenge, she saw protecting the Garden as her new purpose and helped the severely injured Garden's Mentor and the group's remnants relocate to their hideout in Syndicate. She continued to sharpen her skills at the same time, gradually becoming independent. However, she remains deeply concerned about her Mentor's health and constantly worries about lacking the strength to protect her family.
servingTerm1: The subject has always kept her journaling habit inherited from her mother. Whenever possible, she spends over an hour writing and drawing in her journal daily. She also uses ginkgo leaves to make handicrafts like roses. Since the materials and easy to obtain and the products are delightful, many Sinners have asked her for lessons.
servingTerm3: After losing her parents, she's been consumed by vengeance, often disguising herself with an aggressive façade and believing herself unpopular. However, following incidents like giving up a limited edition doll to Mess and helping design decorative laces for Lynn's helmet, her sincerity and kindness have become an open secret among Sinners of her age.
servingTerm4: She gifted Chief a thick limited edition journal and suggested Chief too should jot down three happy moments each day for memories and mood regulation. She even lent some of her own journals to Chief for inspiration.
emotionCheck1:
[Thistle finds an injured stray kitten in the Bureau's sports ground.] 

**Thistle:** Look at all this blood. Chief, can we help it?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Sure. I'll leave it to you then? 
 * **Thistle:** You can find no one better for this job. Taking care of stray cats and dogs is my specialty... Ahem, I just wanted to give that a try. 
 * **Thistle:** 😉

* **Prompt:** Leave it to the medical staff. 
 * **Thistle:** I'll apply to visit it every day... It's not what you think. I, I just wanted to make sure it's not dead... 
 * **Thistle:**  😖
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Good Samaritan

//The Bureau has voted for the winner of the annual Good Samaritan Award.//

**System Notifications:** In the Bureau's annual Good Samaritan Award, Thistle wins by a wide margin. Deeds she's awarded for: Helping the cafeteria lady pick up oranges from the floor, returning lost coins to the staff... She's done many good deeds without telling anyone.

* **Prompt:** Congratulations
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Harmless Bickering

//Thistle and [[[Horo]]] have an argument.//

**System Notifications:** Thistle and Horo are having a heated debate over whether the Garden or the Legion is more formidable.

* **Prompt:** Calm them down
supervision3:
++* ⚠ Lost Item

//You seem to know who the owner of this item is.//

**System Notifications:** There's a new lost item notice about a beautiful journal sticker. You have some idea who the owner is.

* **Prompt:** Notify Thistle
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Roadblock

//Thistle won't allow you to take this path.//

**System Notifications:** You're passing through the corridor of an unused facility when Thistle blocks your way.

**Thistle:** You can't go through here. Take another route.

* **Prompt:** Why?

**Chief:** Toll-collecting is forbidden within the Bureau.

**Thistle:** Anyway, you're not allowed to pass right now.

**System Notifications:** You hear a faint roar, like one coming from a provoked animal.

* **Prompt:** Peek around

**Thistle:** Hey, watch it!

**System Notifications:** You see an injured puppy around the corner. Panicking, it's baring its teeth and growling at you.

**Chief:** Where did this puppy come from?

**Thistle:** I don't know, I found it here. It could be someone's pet, or maybe a stray dog that sneaked in.

**Thistle:** It's a bit stressed because of its injury. I thought I'd give it some space to calm down before taking it back for treatment.

**Thistle:** I told you not to come over! You scared it again!

* **Prompt:** Step back

**System Notifications:** The puppy seems to only like Thistle.

**Thistle:** Hey, that one over there could be annoying... I mean, only sometimes. But don't worry, Chief won't hurt you.

**Chief:** ...
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠ The Defiant One

//It appears there's been a conflict between Thistle and the staff.//

**System Notifications:** As you pass by the Recreation Area, you happen to see Thistle suddenly stopping a staff member, and the atmosphere seems a bit tense.

* **Prompt:** Go near and watch

**Thistle:** Hey! Stop, I'm talking to you.

**Staff Member:** What is it?

**Thistle:** I've heard about you. You're the new guy who just arrived, acting all high and mighty.

**Staff Member:** W-what do you want?

**Thistle:** Don't change the subject. You're the one who won ten times in a row at the claw machine, right?

**Thistle:** Pretty impressive, huh!

**Thistle:** Dare to play three games against me to see who's better?

**Staff Member:** Oh... So that's what this is about. Sure, why not?

**Thistle:** Oh, Chief, you're here too. Wanna join us for our claw-off?

**Chief:** Maybe next time. Have fun.
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Reason for Visiting

//It's said that Thistle has made a cozy living space for herself.//

**System Notifications:** You often get requests to visit Thistle's room. You want to find out more about the situation.

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: Sinner Thistle's current location detected: detention area.

* **Prompt:** Go there

**Thistle:** Why are you here... What are you looking at?! Haven't you seen someone tidying up their room before?

**Chief:** Just to see how you're doing. Also, to find out why everyone's flocking to your place.

**Chief:** Oh? Your room seems a bit different from the others'.

**Thistle:** Hmph! Of course, I put effort into making my room as cozy as possible. I even went to [[[Garofano]]] for advice. I'm most proud of this DIY couch. It's especially comfortable!

**Thistle:** It's comfier than any couch in the Bureau!

* **Prompt:** Look curiously

**Thistle:** Don't believe me?! Try it for yourself.

* **Prompt:** Sit down
 * **System Notifications:** You try sitting on the couch while chatting with Thistle.
 * **System Notifications:** It's indeed comfortable. Having stayed up all night, you feel your eyelids get heavy.
 * **System Notifications:** ...
 * **System Notifications:** Until Thistle laughs triumphantly, startling you awake from your drowsiness.
 * **Thistle:** Everyone comes here for this comfortable couch.
 * **Chief:** Its comfort is sure relaxing... Mind redoing the couches in the hypnosis room too?
 * **Thistle:** Hmph, like I have time for that!

* **Prompt:** Decline
 * **Chief:** I can tell you cherish every day of your life.
 * **Chief:** I'm sure this couch is very comfortable. It feels soft to the touch and rebounds quickly.
 * **Chief:** I may get too comfortable I'll fall asleep the moment I sit down...
 * **Chief:** But I have work later. I'll definitely try it next time.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
We didn't fight tooth and nail to protect the Garden just to let it get ruined by you! How will you pay for this?!

[Raise to Phase 1]
This way... I won't be a burden to everyone anymore.

[Raise to Phase 3]
I will protect the Garden!

[Level Start]
Yes, I heard you. No detours this time, I promise.

[Win Battles]
This way, the Mentor will be proud of me too, right?

[Lose Battles]
I've disgraced the Garden again...

[Ultimate Skill]
Burn to ashes!

[Die in Battles]
Take me... back to the Garden...

[Greeting]
Are you here for the Mentor? ...For me? T-there's nothing I can do for you. Well, I mean... If you don't me messing up, I can try to help.

[Conversation 1]
Don't think that just because you've earned the trust of the Mentor, we'll all bow down to you! I'll be watching you for any missteps!

[Conversation 2]
Hmph, so the Chief of the MBCC runs on just a sandwich for a whole day? One without lettuce, no less? Irregular meals and unbalanced nutrition... No wonder you're all skin and bones... What are you tearing up for? I'm not worrying about you!

[Conversation 3]
The Mentor says no flower is born to be bent and trampled. But there are always people who ruin others' lives for their own despicable greed... They deserve to be burned in blazing fire.

[Special Conversation 1]
Remember to set off earlier next time you get a task on the shopping street. The claw machine? No, I'm not talking about that. It won't be restocked anytime soon. What I mean is, you're always looked down upon by those delinquents, so I suggest you put on some studded jackets. It'll work, just trust me, it's a tried-and-true method.

[Special Conversation 2]
You like the border of this page? My mom designed it. She said the journal was for the good memories only and all the bad things should be erased by the wind... After the Mentor left, everything I saw was gray and I thought I'd never journal again. Fortunately, she brought color back into my world... Yes, and you too. You also helped bring color back to my life, okay?

[Special Conversation 3]
Aren't you tired of looking at your device and the documents all the time? Take some time to catch a breath. Don't know what to do? Just go out for a walk. I do it all the time. Watch the swaying flowers and elaves, the bustling crowds, and the busy shops... That's what life is all about.

[Full Compliance]
We've been looking for a safe place for the Garden to settle in. I just didn't expect it to be here... Ahem! What I mean is, now that the whole Garden has moved here, I can extend my protection for the Garden and the Mentor to you. A-after all, the Mentor will be happy knowing you're safe...

[Idle]
Finally asleep... Both you and the Mentor are workaholics who never rest. At least pause to check on us... We're all worrying about you...

[Annoyed]
Huh? You want to pick a thorny flower? Then be prepared to pay with that hand!

[Special Attention]
What are you staring at? Do I look like someone easy to mess with? Quit staring!

[Dispatch]
Run errands? Sure. I was well trained for this in the Garden. You can count on me!

[Dispatch Complete]
Here's what you asked for... Or... is it?

[Level Up]
Through a century of slashes, the blade's purpose emerges.

voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 下次再碰到去商店街的任务，记得早点出发。娃娃机？不是，娃娃机上新还要很久。我是想说你出任务老被那些街溜子看不起，可以多去买点带铆钉的挂上。实测有用，信我。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 下次再碰到去商店街的任務，記得早點出發。娃娃機？不是，娃娃機更新還要很久。我是想說你出任務老被那些街溜子看不起，可以多去買點帶鉚釘的掛上。實測有用，信我。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: You like the border of this page? My mom designed it. She said the journal was for the good memories only and all the bad things should be erased by the wind... After the Mentor left, everything I saw was gray and I thought I'd never journal again. Fortunately, she brought color back into my world... Yes, and you too. You also helped bring color back to my life, okay?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: このページのフレームが可愛い？お母さんがデザインしてくれたものよ。手帳にはいいことしか書かないで、悪いことは風に任せて消してもらえばいいって言ってたわ……師匠がいなくなってから、見えるものが全部灰色になって、手帳に書くこともなくなったと思ってた。でも、また師匠が私に色を取り戻してくれたの……ああ、あなたもね。あなたも色を取り戻してくれた功労者よ。これで満足？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 이 페이지의 테두리가 예쁘다고? 우리 엄마가 디자인한 거야. 엄마는 다이어리에는 좋은 것만 쓰고, 나쁜 건 모두 바람에 흘려보내야 한다고 했어… 사부님이 떠나신 후, 온 세상이 회색으로 변해버려서 다시는 다이어리를 쓸 수 없을 거라 생각했는데, 다행히 사부님이 내게 색을 다시 찾아주셨어… 그래, 맞아, 너도 마찬가지야, 너도 내게 색을 다시 찾아 준 일등 공신이야, 됐지!?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 这一页的边框很漂亮？是我妈妈设计的。她说手账里只能写好的东西，坏的都留给风去磨灭……业师离开后，我看什么都是灰色，还以为自己已经失去了再写手账的机会。好在，她又把颜色带回了我身边。……啊，还有你，你也是把颜色带回给我的功臣，行了吧！
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 這一頁的邊框很漂亮？是我媽媽設計的。她說手帳裡只能寫好的東西，壞的都留給風去磨滅……業師離開後，我看什麼都是灰色，還以為自己已經失去了再寫手帳的機會。好在，她又把顏色帶回了我身邊。……啊，還有你，你也是把顏色帶回給我的功臣，行了吧！
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Aren't you tired of looking at your device and the documents all the time? Take some time to catch a breath. Don't know what to do? Just go out for a walk. I do it all the time. Watch the swaying flowers and leaves, the bustling crowds, and the busy shops... That's what life is all about.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 1日中端末やファイルと向き合って疲れないの？少し息抜きしてもいいんじゃない？えっ、何をすればいいか分からない？街の散策はオススメよ。私もよくやってるわ。見て、揺れる花や木々、行き交う人の流れ、賑やかなお店を……うん、これが日常ってものよ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 하루 종일 단말기랑 서류를 붙들고 있으면 안 피곤해? 쉴 시간 좀 내 봐. 뭘 해야 할지 모르겠다고? 거리 구경하면 되지, 나도 자주 해. 꽃이 바람에 흔들리는 풍경, 사람들이 오가는 풍경, 떠들썩한 가게의 풍경… 이게 바로 삶이지.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 成天对着终端和文件，你不累吗？抽点时间出来喘口气吧。不知道该做什么？去街上逛逛也行啊，我就经常这么干。看看花树摇摆，人流交错，店铺喧闹……那才叫过日子呢。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 成天對著裝置和文件，你不累嗎？抽點時間出來喘口氣吧。不知道該做什麼？去街上逛逛也行啊，我就經常這麼幹。看看花樹搖擺，人流交錯，店舖喧鬧……那才叫過日子呢。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: We've been looking for a safe place for the Garden to settle in. I just didn't expect it to be here... Ahem! What I mean is, now that the whole Garden has moved here, I can extend my protection for the Garden and the Mentor to you. After all, the Mentor will be happy knowing you're safe...
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 花庭園が安らげる場所をずっと探していたけど、まさかここに辿り着くなんてね……ゴホン！私が言いたいのは、花庭園が丸ごとここに引っ越してきたわけだし、私が花庭園と師匠を守る時、ついでにあなたも守ってあげられるってことよ。き、きっとあなたをしっかり守れば、師匠も喜んでくれるから……
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 우린 줄곧 화원이 안정을 찾을 수 있는 보금자리를 찾아다녀 왔어. 결국 이런 곳에 정착할 줄은 몰랐지만… 큼! 어쨌든 화원이 전부 이쪽으로 옮겨왔으니, 내가 화원과 사부님을 지키는 김에 너도 지켜줄 수 있어. 어, 어차피 널 잘 지키면 사부님도 좋아하실 테니까...
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 我们一直在找能让花园安心的归宿，没想到最后会在这里……咳！我是想说，既然花园都整个搬到这儿来了，那我保护花园和业师的时候，也可以顺带保护一下你。反、反正保护好你，业师也会开心……
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 我們一直在找能讓花園安心的歸宿，沒想到最後會在這裡……咳！我是想說，既然花園都整個搬到這來了，那我保護花園和業師的時候，也可以順帶保護一下你。反、反正保護好你，業師也會開心……
voicelines.Idle - EN: Finally asleep... Both you and the Mentor are workaholics who never rest. At least pause to check on us... We're all worrying about you...
voicelines.Idle - JP: やっと寝た……まったく、この人師匠にそっくりね。アドバイスなんて全然聞かないし、休まないし。せめて立ち止まって私たちを見て……あなたのことを心配してる人はたくさんいるのよ……
voicelines.Idle - KR: 겨우 잠들었네… 에휴, 이 녀석도 사부님이랑 똑같네. 아무리 잔소리해도 듣질 않고, 쉬지를 않아. 잠깐 쉬면서 우리도 좀 봐줘… 많은 사람이 널 걱정하고 있으니까…
voicelines.Idle - CN: 总算睡了……真是的，这家伙怎么跟业师一模一样，怎么劝都不听、不休息。至少停下来看看我们吧……可有好多人，在担心你呢……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 總算睡了……真是的，這傢伙怎麼跟業師一模一樣，怎麼勸都不聽、不休息。至少停下來看看我們吧……可有好多人，在擔心你呢……
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Huh? You want to pick a thorny flower? Then be prepared to pay with that hand!
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: はぁ～？まさかトゲのある花を摘みたいの？それなら手を残す準備をしなさい！
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 하~? 가시 돋은 꽃을 꺾으려고? 그럼 네 손을 내어줄 각오는 돼 있겠지?
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 哈~？你居然想摘带刺的花？那就做好把手留下来的准备吧！
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 蛤？你居然想摘帶刺的花？那就做好把手留下來的準備吧！
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: What are you staring at? Do I look like someone easy to mess with? Quit staring!
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 何見てるのよ？私がいじめられっ子に見える？これ以上見るなら、その目玉がどうなるか分からないわよ！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 뭘 봐? 내가 만만해 보여? 계속 그렇게 쳐다보면, 네 눈을 조심해야 할 거야.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 看什么看？是我看起来好欺负吗？再看、再看小心你的眼珠子！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 看什麼看？是我看起來好欺負嗎？再看、再看小心你的眼珠子！
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: Run errands? Sure. I was well trained for this in the Garden. You can count on me!
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: 私をパシる気？まあいいわ、問題ない。花庭園で練習したから！
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 심부름을 다녀오라고? 좋아, 화원에서 연습해 봤으니, 문제없을 거야!
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 出门跑腿？可以。我在花园练过，不会出问题的！
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 出門跑腿？可以。我在花園練過，不會出問題的！
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Here's what you asked for... Or... is it?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: あなたが欲しがってたものよ……あ、合ってるでしょ？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 네가 말한 물건이야. 이… 이거 맞겠지?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 你要的东西。……应、应该没错吧？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 你要的東西。……應、應該沒錯吧？
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Through a century of slashes, the blade's purpose emerges.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 剣を100回振れば、その意味が分かる。
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 검을 백번 휘두르면, 저절로 터득하게 되지.
